Title: Automator .NET
Description: Automator .NET implements point-and-click (or drag and drop) creation of workflows for automating repetitive tasks into batches.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Automator .NET implements point-and-click (or drag and drop) creation of workflows for automating repetitive tasks into batches.


Automator .NET implements point-and-click (or drag and drop) creation of workflows for automating repetitive tasks into batches.

The power of Automator .NET is anybody can create plugins for extend Automator .NET functionalities.
